mapper.select: select user_no , user_name , user_id , user_pwd , email , to_char(to_date(birth), 'YYYY/MM/DD') birth , phone , call , post , address , address_detail , to_char(to_date(hire_date), 'YYYY/MM/DD') hire_date , end_date , status , dept_code , dept_name , job_code , admin_yn , image from employee join department using(dept_code) where status = 'Y' and user_id = #{userId}

select user_no , user_name , dept_name dept_code , job_code , decode(job_code, 1, '사원' , 2, '주임' , 3, '대리' , 4, '과장' , 9, '대표이사') job_name from employee join department using(dept_code)
where dept_code = #{deptNum}
and job_code = 9
order by job_code desc

select user_no , user_name , dept_name dept_code , job_code , decode(job_code, 1, '사원' , 2, '주임' , 3, '대리' , 4, '과장' , 9, '대표이사') job_name from employee join department using(dept_code) where user_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by job_code desc

select user_no , user_name , call , dept_name , decode(job_code, 1, '사원' , 2, '주임' , 3, '대리' , 4, '과장' , 9, '대표이사') job_name , admin_yn , email from employee join department using(dept_code) where admin_yn = 'Y'
